thread.title: The Free Trips Your Financial Adviser Takes Could Cost You

author: Jason Zweig
title: The Free Trips Your Financial Adviser Takes Could Cost You
text: If you want to travel to beautiful resorts for free, become a financial adviser. Later this month, three dozen advisers will spend three days at the Ritz-Carlton Hotel in Marina del Rey, Calif., all expenses paid. Next month, about 75 wealth managers will spend four days and three nights in Mexico City, staying at the Four Brexit & Beyond: Mixed Picture for British Prime Minister After Local Elections Next WSJ City PM: Why a 3.9% US Jobless Rate Is a Big Deal, How the Dollar Dominated a Week in Markets
